legal article: Sauf si les parties ont convenu d'une durée inférieure, le bail étudiant est réputé conclu pour une durée d'un an.Il prend fin à l'expiration du terme convenu ou réputé moyennant un préavis d'un mois notifié par l'une ou l'autre partie. Au terme de la durée d'un an, si l'étudiant continue à occuper les lieux sans opposition du bailleur, le bail est prorogé pour une durée d'un an aux mêmes conditions, sans préjudice de l'indexation.Si le bail a été conclu pour une durée inférieure à un an, à défaut d'un congé notifié par l'une ou l'autre des parties et si l'étudiant continue à occuper les lieux sans opposition du bailleur, le bail est réputé avoir été conclu pour une période d'un an à compter de la date à laquelle le bail initial de moins d'un an est entré en vigueur. Dans ce cas, le loyer et les autres conditions demeurent inchangés par rapport à ceux convenus dans le bail initial.
articleEN: Unless the parties have agreed to a shorter duration, the student lease is deemed to be concluded for a duration of one year. It ends at the expiration of the agreed term or by tacit agreement, by means of a one-month notice given by either party. At the end of the one-year period, if the student continues to occupy the premises without opposition from the landlord, the lease is extended for a further period of one year under the same conditions, without prejudice to indexation. If the lease was concluded for a duration less than one year, in the absence of notice given by either party and if the student continues to occupy the premises without opposition from the landlord, the lease is deemed to have been concluded for a period of one year starting from the date on which the initial lease of less than one year came into force. In this case, the rent and other conditions remain unchanged with respect to those agreed in the initial lease.
question: Quelle est la durée de mon bail étudiant en Wallonie ?
questionEN: What is the duration of my student lease in Wallonia? (assuming the question is asked by a student)
answerLLM: Based on the provided legal article, the duration of a student lease in Wallonia is one year, unless the parties have agreed to a shorter duration. After the initial one-year period, if the student continues to occupy the premises without opposition from the landlord, the lease is automatically extended for a further period of one year under the same conditions, without prejudice to indexation. If the lease was concluded for a duration less than one year, and the student continues to occupy the premises without opposition from the landlord, the lease is deemed to have been concluded for a period of one year starting from the date on which the initial lease of less than one year came into force. In this case, the rent and other conditions remain unchanged with respect to those agreed in the initial lease. A one-month notice is required by either party to terminate the lease.
goldy: The student lease lasts a maximum of 1 year. It is a one-year lease, even if the duration of the lease: is not specified in the contract; is more than 1 year in the contract. However, it is possible to agree on a duration shorter than 1 year. The student lease can be extended. It does not end automatically at the specified expiration date. For the student lease to end at the specified expiration date, one of the parties (you or the landlord) must send a notice no later than 1 month before the expiration. If a one-year student lease expires without either party having sent a notice, it is extended for 1 year under the same conditions. The landlord cannot claim an increase in rent, but he can index it. See the question "Can my landlord index the rent of my student room?" If a student lease of less than 1 year expires without either party having sent a notice, it becomes a one-year lease. It is considered that the lease was concluded for 1 year from the outset. It can then be extended like any other one-year student lease. For example: You have entered into a student lease for 10 months, from September 1, 2019 to June 30, 2020. As you have a second session, you do not send a notice, and the landlord does not either. You remain in the accommodation after June 30, 2020. Your lease has become a one-year lease that began on September 1 and ends on August 31, 2020. If neither you nor the landlord send a notice before July 31, 2020, your lease is extended for another year, from September 1, 2020 to August 31, 2021. Beware! Each time the student lease is extended, you must again prove to your landlord that you are a student. To find out if your lease is a student lease and how to prove your student status, see the question "Is my lease a student lease?"
